descriptionHtml:
Description:

Tuppence is a new horse that can be found at the Whiterun stables. He is smaller than vanilla horses but much stronger and twice as fast. He will attack nearby enemies rather than flee. He can be summoned using a new spell which is in the stable atop a hay bale.

Features:

- New Horse race named \"Tuppence Race\".
- Modified Horse Skeleton to give Tuppence his unique look.
- New spell so Tuppence can be summoned.
- New combat class and style to make him more aggressive.

Requirements:

Only uses vanilla assets with the exception of the skeleton which is included.

Compatibility:

May conflict with any mod that changes horses.
author: Tenacious Panda
